item.title: Northbound Ramp from I-85 to GA-166
item.description: Northbound Ramp from I-85 to GA-166. Use right lanes for GA-166 East/Langford Parkway; use left lanes for GA-166 West/Langford Parkway/East Point. Continue in center lanes for I-75 North/I-85 North/Atlanta.
